sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with feng fei 風痱 , wind disablement. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 191: 此骨消則病痱 緩 , “In this case the bones dissolve, and this makes people suffer from disablement with flaccidity ”. Fei huo 肺火 , lung fire [23]
Pathological Condition and Etiological Agent. identical with fei re 肺熱 , lung heat. SWBJQYBMJ Lj: 石膏，瀉 肺火 , “ Shi gao drains lung fire ”. Fei ji 肺積 , lung accumulation [2]

Pathological Condition identical with xi ben 息賁 , rapid breathing. Mai jing 脈經 8: 診得肺積脈浮而毛 , “An examination finds a lung accumulation with a [movement in the] vessels that is at the surface and hair-like”.
